sections.content:
👤 **Prospecting** 👤 

"What is Prospecting?"

**Summary:**
- The way you are going to get paid is by reaching out to clients
- You want success as fast and easy instead of doing the work and following the actions steps and checklists
- Doing the work consistently is all you need to do

**Action steps:**
- Speak positively about yourself
- Take notes

•


🧲 **Prospecting Explained** 🧲 

"How To Swarm Your Account With Leads"

**Summary:**
- The goal of a social media platform is to keep users on the platform as long as possible
- Unfollow anyone who isn’t relevant
- Follow people in your niche to curate the content you see
- Social media is for making money not wasting your time

**Action steps:**
- Unfollow any accounts that aren’t relevant
- Follow and interact with relevant accounts

•




"Build A Client Archetype"

**Summary:**
- You should be clear on exactly who you are offering your services to
- You can be selective once you have experience, until then you should take anything
- ChatGPT can help you save time in researching your ideal archetype

**Prompt: **
You are extremely skilled at understanding ideal clients for a particular service. List out and define my ideal client as a freelancer for my [insert] service in the [insert] niche. Provide insights about their pain points, desires, services they offer, character traits, and [insert others you want to know].

**Action steps:**
- Identify the exact archetype of clients you’d like to work with

•




"The Steps For Prospecting"

**Summary:**
- Step 1: Make a Google sheet to track prospects
- Step 2: Use the simple steps to search for prospects
- Step 3: Find 1 account that meets the 3 criteria - 10k to 100k followers | Good engagement for their following | Something to sell
- Step 4: Add the account to your spreadsheet
- Step 5: Go to their account and see who they follow
- Step 6 : Add them to your spreadsheet
- Step 7: Begin reaching out
- Step 8: Keep track of who you’ve reached out to
- Step 9: Repeat until you make it to Moneybag Super Soldier ($5k+)

Google Sheet Link: [CLICK HERE](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QwqUhPjRUGH1HhQmJXucw_L2jWjpavSw1bVdPh0g0DI/edit?usp=sharing)

**Action steps:**
Follow the Prospecting Simple Steps

•




"Different Approaches"

**Summary:**
- Widespread: reaching out to everyone to get testimonials or smaller paying clients
- Targeted: reaching out to high-quality prospects to get your ideal high-paying clients
- Start with widespread as a beginner then transition into targeted as you advance as a freelancer
- Starting with targeted can also work

**Action steps:**
- Experiment with the two approaches

•


🏟️ **Your Next Steps** 🏟️ 

"Leveraging Existing Clients"

**Summary:**
- Upsell - you can sell your existing clients with extra services
- Charge a retainer + percentage
- Ask existing clients for referrals
- Create a case study

**Action steps:**
- Apply the methods to make use of your existing clients

•




"Potential Problems"

**Summary:**
- Can’t find more clients - try different social media platforms or niches
- Prospects block, insult or ignore - ensure you appear professional, build rapport, be creative or just move on
- Feel like giving up - giving up is the only way to ensure failure, if others can do it, so can you

**Action steps:**
- Use the methods above to overcome common problems you might face

•




"Common Questions"

**Summary:**
- Should I use paid tools? -> Not in the beginning, you need to learn
- Should I hire someone to prospect for me? -> You should do it yourself before thinking about hiring someone
- Can I monetize the skill of prospecting? -> Yes, lead generation is a skill but you still must do prospecting
- How long should I spend prospecting every day? -> Depends on you but 30 minutes to 1 hour
- Will I be prospecting forever? -> You should be delivering exceptional results so that you get referred
- How do I manage my time with prospecting? -> List out your tasks and give yourself time limits
- How do I measure the success of my prospecting? -> Use a Google sheet to track your prospecting

**Action steps:**
- Apply the answers to these common questions when you encounter them

**Simple Steps:**

**Step 1:** Make a Google Sheet
This sheet should have the following headings.
X Username | IG Username | Email | DMed | Followed Up With.
Use the sheet template.

**Step 2:** Use The Simple Steps
Identify your archetype.
Follow the simple steps to search for clients on social media.

**Step 3:** Find One Account
Find one account that meets the three criteria.
10k to 100k followers | Good engagement that matches their following | Something to sell.
Search for relevant hashtags, Gumroad method and Udemy method.

**Step 4:** Add Them To Your Sheet
Add their details to your sheet to track your progress with them

**Step 5:** See Who They Follow
On their account, see who they're following.
These people are likely respectable prospects.
You can easily find 10-60 quality prospects from one account.

**Step 6:** Add These To Your Sheet
Keep growing your client base and fulfilling the work for your existing repeat clients.

**Step 7:** Begin Reaching Out
All this can be done in one day - don't waste hours
On IG, aim for 10 people per day
On X, you can reach out to up to 1k but aim for 10-30
On LinkedIn, follow the LinkedIn course

**Step 8:** Keep Track of Your Outreach
Track who you've reached out to in your sheet
Follow up after 3 days if you've not heard back
If you get no response, approach them on a different platform

**Step 9:** Repeat
Repeat these steps until you reach the Super Soldier certification by earning at least $5k from freelancing
Then leverage other freelancers to build your business and join the Moneybag Club

Are you going to continue this course?

A Of course
